meanings.meaning: as slick as nothing at all

vlive.korean: 오늘 여러분의 가슴을 가장 뛰게 한 순간은 언제였나요? When was the moment that made your heart beat the most? 듣기 View video V HEARTBEAT - 2019 VLIVE AWARDS : [Full] 2019 VLIVE AWARDS V HEARTBEAT PART3
vlive.english: When was the moment that made your heart beat the most?

vlive.korean: 피부가 한순간에 망가졌어요. My skin got suddenly bad. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : Shinwon say something
너무 기회처럼 느껴지는군요 한순간 한순간이. Every moment feels like an opportunity. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#148. 아이들 라디오 (w. (여자)아이들)
vlive.english: Every moment feels like an opportunity.

vlive.korean: 한순간에 또 여러분들 부탁을 드리도록 하겠습니다. so please do so. 듣기 View video JBJ95 : JBJ95 Showcase 'AWAKE'
[한순간 하이틴 영화인 줄 알고 팝콘 깠잖아] 10대? [I thought it is a teen movie so I opened a bag of popcorn] Like a teenager? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GFRIEND] 🐣모찌쫀득세젤예양갈린 큐티력에 태양신도 눈부시대☀️(Yerin talking with fans)
vlive.english: [I thought it is a teen movie so I opened a bag of popcorn] Like a teenager?
